title: Tasty Kali Mirch Murgh ( Black Pepper Chicken ) Kebab Recipe
content:
Kali Mirch Kebab is a very humble recipe, it needs just a handful of ingredients but the taste is spectacular. This pepper kebab is so good.

Black Pepper Kebab Recipe - Kali Mirch Murgh Kebab Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 10 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Appetizer

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 3 servings

 

Ingredients

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams cubed

Black Pepper Powder - 1 tablespoon to 2 tablespoons

Yogurt / Curd - ½ cup

Cream - ¼ cup

Cornflour - 1 tablespoon

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Kasuri Methi Leaves - 1 tablespoon

Oil - 2 tablespoons

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients except oil. Let it marinate for 1 hour to overnight.

Heat oil in a pan. Drop chicken in and cook on medium-low heat for 3 to 4 mins on each side.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
